title: sammmy
author: sammmy
content: Have heard good things about this forum and my team and I decide to do some campaigns on this forum to help our project gain the needed traffic due to the current situation of the market.How can we do it?Is there someone that offers this service?If yes, any idea of their price?I need information on this so I can give the team feedback.

comments.author: notocactus
comments.body: Quote from: sammmy on May 10, 2022, 01:58:53 AMHave heard good things about this forum and my team and I decide to do some campaigns on this forum to help our project gain the needed traffic due to the current situation of the market.It seems you choose a bad time to start your campaign. When people are in pains, they will more hesitated to invest or spend their money for whatever usage.QuoteHow can we do it?Two optionsDo it yourself. You and/ or any member of your team can manage your own campaignSignature campaign guideline (read this before starting or joining a campaign)Hire an experienced manager to do it for your teamQuoteIs there someone that offers this service?If yes, any idea of their price?It depends on lot of things.If your team want to hire high quality posters who likely bring more effects to your project, you should pay high rates for manager and participantsTotal participants in a campaign. Small or big number of participants will cause to light or big workload on manager.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Quote from: sammmy on May 10, 2022, 01:58:53 AMIs there someone that offers this service?Yes, there are actually a lot of managers that you can hire to do this job for you. I can recommend you the one that's currently managing the campaign that I'm in.He's sujonali, here's his thread:  ðŸ’  Sujonali1819 ðŸ’  Professional Campaign Management Service ðŸ’ AvailableðŸ’ About the pricing, I don't know, it varies from manager to manager and how much you've got into your agreement. You're free to contact him.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: sammmy on May 10, 2022, 01:58:53 AMHave heard good things about this forum and my team and I decide to do some campaigns on this forum to help our project gain the needed traffic due to the current situation of the market.How can we do it?Is there someone that offers this service?If yes, any idea of their price?I need information on this so I can give the team feedback.Hired a reputable manager that can offer you a good marketing service and avoid such bogus manager whose aim is to help you with unorganized campaign. Regarding the funds, its up to your budget actually whether how much you can spare on the project. Also depends which one you are going to use such as btc paid or pay in altcoins of your project or any other tokens.

comments.author: StormHawk
comments.body: Hire bounty managers on the forum, also I suggest you make a plan for escrow, this days too many projects use and dump bounty hunters after the campaign is finally over, go after the top rated bounty managers like CryptopreneurBrainboss, Julerz12 and Joeperry, also its better to create a ANN (announcement) of your project on this forum so that people can look into the project here. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=159.0

comments.author: Findingnemo
comments.body: Quote from: sammmy on May 10, 2022, 01:58:53 AMHave heard good things about this forum and my team and I decide to do some campaigns on this forum to help our project gain the needed traffic due to the current situation of the market.How can we do it?Is there someone that offers this service?If yes, any idea of their price?I need information on this so I can give the team feedback.There are two ways, if you are ready to pay in bitcoin then go toÂ  Services section and where you can look for people by posting your signatures, criteria also you can hire a campaign manager to do this job for you while you only need to pay the money and everything will be handled by them for you.If you want to pay in your own tokens or any other altcoins then campaign thread should be in Bounties (Altcoins) and rest is same as above.

comments.author: aysg76
comments.body: Quote from: sammmy on May 10, 2022, 01:58:53 AMHave heard good things about this forum and my team and I decide to do some campaigns on this forum to help our project gain the needed traffic due to the current situation of the market.How can we do it?Okay so you are into promoting your business on the forum so at first i would suggest you to buy  Copper Membership  on the forum that will help you to get above the restrictions of newbies account like posting images without reaching junior rank.Moreover it will have some creditability of your account on the forum as most of the business do this.Second you can set-up proper ANN thread for your business disclosing the information about your project and as you buy Copper membership you could easily do it and engage more audience interaction to your site and gain attention.Third is you could simply advertise on the forum as Round 350 is live  Quote from: sammmy on May 10, 2022, 01:58:53 AMIs there someone that offers this service?Yes there are many campaign manager on the forum who could help you this way and promote your business through signature, bounty campaign and escrow services as they have trust on the forum and they will be best for you in this case like :Hhampuz Campaign Management, Escrow Service & Promotions | Available Now!Overview of Bitcointalk Signature Anti-Spam Campaign ManagersFor your designs and ANN thread you could contact @Jaycee who is suitable for this job and you can contact him for designing your ANN threads, signature, Avatar and logos ----JAYCE DESIGNS---- Logo, Avatar, Signature, Banner, etc.So you can have proper discussion with the team and decide what will be your choice of promoting the business.

comments.author: TheBeardedBaby
comments.body: Quote from: aysg76 on May 10, 2022, 10:59:17 AMQuote from: sammmy on May 10, 2022, 01:58:53 AMHave heard good things about this forum and my team and I decide to do some campaigns on this forum to help our project gain the needed traffic due to the current situation of the market.How can we do it?Overview of Bitcointalk Signature Anti-Spam Campaign Managerspugman did a very good job here, you can choose a reputable manager from his list if you don't want to manage your project yourself. BTW managing a project yourself is not that difficult following the guidelines and always use an escrow to hold the funds, people will trust you more.

comments.author: Franctoshi
comments.body: Quote from: sammmy on May 10, 2022, 01:58:53 AMHave heard good things about this forum and my team and I decide to do some campaigns on this forum to help our project gain the needed traffic due to the current situation of the market.How can we do it?Is there someone that offers this service?If yes, any idea of their price?I need information on this so I can give the team feedback.If the project that you and your team are in charge is worth managing ,I suggest you get some good escrows here to manage the campaign for you people, regardless of the current situation in the market good projects with good team and good community can still thrive and I assure you that you're in the right place you can meet reputable managers who can handle the project campaign successfully by you making use of the service board to find someone.

comments.author: Bhig Daddy
comments.body: I suggest you get a bounty manager, you can also get some good escrow to manage your campaign, I think now matter how bad the market is a good project and good team can always create wave in the crypto world.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: sammmy on May 10, 2022, 01:58:53 AMHave heard good things about this forum and my team and I decide to do some campaigns on this forum to help our project gain the needed traffic due to the current situation of the market.How can we do it?Is there someone that offers this service?If yes, any idea of their price?I need information on this so I can give the team feedback.Yes. You will find many reputable campaign managers on this forum.aysg76 has already mentioned this, but you can find the list of the most popular managers here: Overview of Bitcointalk Signature Anti-Spam Campaign ManagersAs for their price, it depends on the type of campaign you want to run. It is best to negotiate this directly with the managers.It is also possible to run your own campaign, but it is not recommended if you have no previous experience. Quite a few things could go wrong.

comments.author: Dunamisx
comments.body: Quote from: sammmy on May 10, 2022, 01:58:53 AMHave heard good things about this forum and my team and I decide to do some campaigns on this forum to help our project gain the needed traffic due to the current situation of the market.How can we do it?Is there someone that offers this service?If yes, any idea of their price?I need information on this so I can give the team feedback.You can engage your campaign on this forum and we have them of two different categories, the first is the signature campaign which is the most common whereby you make your payment to your participants in bitcoin, and the other one is the bounty campaign which allows you to engage payment in other cryptocurrencies, you can find to locate a good manager to hire and help manage your campaign on the services board under economy, there's a number of threads there that campaign manager can help you through your budget.

comments.author: Odo1972
comments.body: There are lots of Bounty managers who can handle your Campaigns efficiently such Bounty DetectiveÂ http://t.me/bounty/814, champaigns https://t.me/Jcampaigns and more.

comments.author: Despairo
comments.body: Quote from: Odo1972 on February 04, 2023, 12:24:23 AMThere are lots of Bounty managers who can handle your Campaigns efficiently such Bounty DetectiveÂ http://t.me/bounty/814Nah he's one of bad campaign managers, you need to check his feedback where he was managing several scam projects which I don't think it's trustworthy to hire him https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=2695747Quote from: roksana.hee on February 04, 2023, 04:55:42 AM1. You would be the campaign manager2. Hire someone, experienced campaign managerBuilding a decision,if your answer is 1, then you need to buy Copper Member here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=credit;promoteif your answer is 2, then you need to hire a bounty manager here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=52.0#1 To become a campaign manager you don't need to buy Copper membership, yes a newbie rank can't attach an image, but actually you don't need to have a good ANN in signature campaign. What you need is know how to judge the quality post and how you can make the project become successful.#2 It's not a list of campaign manager, just look at the above user which already gave a good list of campaign manager.
